properties.name: FEED_FORWARD_PROP_TO_PROCESS
properties.description: Comma-separated list of property names indicating which properties in the feed-forward track or detection to consider for language detection. If the first property listed is present, then that property will be processed. If it's not, then the next property in the list is considered. At most, one property will be processed.
